Node.definition: = period of time, measured by a complete cycle in the phases of the moon
= state in which a countable entity is the third in a range

Node.gloss: to go out|to come out|to go away|to leave|to depart
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= nation and their territory; ◄ regarded as founded by one of the sons of Ham (חָם) with the same name

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= area not very suitable for sedentary life and agriculture because of its lack of water; suitable for grazing domestic animals and only inhabited by nomadic tribes and wild animals
= mountain and surrounding desert on the Sinai Peninsula in Egypt, also known as Mount Horeb (חֹורֵב) ► location where YHWH (יהוה) entered into a covenant (בְּרִית) with Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
literally to pluck up (the tent pegs); hence: = action by which a relatively large company of humans, together with their possessions, departs from a place where they had set up a temporary residence
= location ◄ in Sinai (סִינַי) peninsula, between Alush (אָלוּשׁ) and wilderness of Sinai; ► Israelites (יִשְׂרָאֵל) encamped there on their way from Egypt (מִצְרַיִם) to Canaan (כְּנַעַן)
= area not very suitable for sedentary life and agriculture because of its lack of water; suitable for grazing domestic animals and only inhabited by nomadic tribes and wild animals
= mountain and surrounding desert on the Sinai Peninsula in Egypt, also known as Mount Horeb (חֹורֵב) ► location where YHWH (יהוה) entered into a covenant (בְּרִית) with Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)

Node.gloss: to set up (a tent)|to erect (a tent)|to encamp
Node.definition: = action by which an individual or group of people settles in a certain location for a limited period of time and often for a specific purpose
= area not very suitable for sedentary life and agriculture because of its lack of water; suitable for grazing domestic animals and only inhabited by nomadic tribes and wild animals

Node.gloss: to set up (a tent)|to erect (a tent)|to encamp
Node.definition: = action by which an individual or group of people settles in a certain location for a limited period of time and often for a specific purpose

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= a relatively high elevation of the earth’s surface; generally higher than a hill (גִּבְעָה)
= man; ◄ son of Amram (עַמְרָם) and Jochebed (יֹוכֶבֶד) younger brother of Miriam (מִרְיָם) and Aaron (אַהֲרֹן) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► leader of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) during exodus

Node.gloss: to go up|to climb up|to mount
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals or objects go to a place that is situated at a higher elevation, by foot, carried by hand, or with the help of a vehicle
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= action by which humans or deities speak with a loud voice, often to draw attention to themselves or to their situation and expecting someone to respond in one way or another
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= a relatively high elevation of the earth’s surface; generally higher than a hill (גִּבְעָה)

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
literally: house; hence: = a group of people associated with a house, such as the family living there, or the descendants of the head of the household

= man, also known as Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) ◄ second son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) ► one of the patriarchs of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) in poetic texts often used as a reference to the entire people of Israel
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= referent to a group of male (and female) participants that are addressed if a discourse

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action
= nation and their territory; ◄ regarded as founded by one of the sons of Ham (חָם) with the same name
= state in which humans, animals, or objects are bearing a load while moving from one place to another

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= part of body; ◄ of bird, insect, celestial creature; ► used for flying but also to give protection

exact meaning unknown; possibly: = a grouping of large birds of prey with keen eyesight; ► unclean and therefore not to be eaten; ≈ associated with large size and great strength, ability to fly great distances at high speed; symbol of protection, metaphor for God, but also symbol for death in battle

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= a marker indicating that an important statement is following and demanding the attention of the listener
= marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place
= action by which humans or deities act in accordance with a certain (usually) prescribed pattern of behavior, such as a law, covenant, etc.

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= a solemn agreement between two or more parties (persons, groups, nations, deities) with stipulations, blessings, and curses

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= referent to a group of male (and female) participants that are addressed if a discourse
= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others

= a large body of people united by common descent, religion, or language, inhabiting a particular state or territory, led by one common leader; often referring to the non Israelite nations, especially when used in plural
literally: holy; hence: = state in which people have separated themselves from others ► in order to live their life in conformity to God's commandments
= marker identifying a set of multiple objects with a set that already exists in the mind of the hearers
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

= action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually not directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= man; ◄ son of Amram (עַמְרָם) and Jochebed (יֹוכֶבֶד) younger brother of Miriam (מִרְיָם) and Aaron (אַהֲרֹן) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► leader of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) during exodus
literally: to cry out; hence: = causative action by which humans or deities let (other) humans know that they are to come, either by approaching them directly or sending a message

= a council or a group of older men who act with authority on behalf of or over their people; some represent an entire nation, others manage the affairs at the town level; some provide their leader with counsel; involved in both judicial and military decisions, and participating in cultic ceremonies; ≈ expected to be wise and considered worthy of deference and respect
literally: to place before (someone); hence: = causative action by which humans pass on a message to other humans ◄ as if it were an object placed in front of them

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= marker identifying a set of multiple objects with a set that already exists in the mind of the hearers
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= action in which humans or deities respond to a question or situation, either by words or by actions
= state in which humans or objects are jointly involved in an event

= mass of visible, condensed watery vapor floating in the air; ► producing rain; ≈ God is said to envelop himself with clouds

Node.definition: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)

Node.gloss: to have faith|to keep faith|to trust|to believe

= a long duration of time that is or may seem unending, whether in the past or in the future
= man; ◄ son of Amram (עַמְרָם) and Jochebed (יֹוכֶבֶד) younger brother of Miriam (מִרְיָם) and Aaron (אַהֲרֹן) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► leader of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) during exodus

= action by which humans remove physical or ritual contamination from their body, or from objects, by dipping it in water
= generic term for clothing

= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

= one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used to see things, after which the observed information is stored and processed in the mind; sparkling when the body is healthy and strong, but dim when weak or sick; the eyes also play a significant role in determining whether a person is considered beautiful or not; eyes can reflect both an attitude of compassion and a sentiment of malice; ≈ high eyes are associated with pride, whereas lowly eyes are connected with humility; a good eye is associated with generosity, whereas an evil eye denotes stinginess; winking the eye is associated with underhanded practices
= a relatively high elevation of the earth’s surface; generally higher than a hill (גִּבְעָה)
= mountain and surrounding desert on the Sinai Peninsula in Egypt, also known as Mount Horeb (חֹורֵב) ► location where YHWH (יהוה) entered into a covenant (בְּרִית) with Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= causative action by which someone establishes a boundary between two areas in order to ensure that nobody will cross over to the other side without special permission

= a relatively high elevation of the earth’s surface; generally higher than a hill (גִּבְעָה)
= process by which humans or animals stop living, either spontaneously or as a result of an act of aggression

= process or action by which the hand or another part of the body of humans gets in brief contact with an object, either or not deliberately
literally: hand; hence: = process by which humans or deties engage in an act of violence against (other) humans
= causative action by which humans kill other humans or animals by throwing rocks at them until they die
= causative action by which humans kill other humans or animals by throwing rocks at them until they die
= particle linking two entities by which X and Y are alternative options that exclude each other
literally: to be shot; hence: = causative action whereby humans or animals are killed by arrows
literally: to be shot; hence: = causative action whereby humans or animals are killed by arrows
= marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place
= general term for any animal that has been domesticated; ≈ considered part of someone's wealth

= action by which humans produce a prolonged sound with a musical instrument
= musical instrument ◄ made of a ram's horn, ► and used to send sound signals to people for communication purposes

= open area where people are living in tents or other temporary dwellings for a limited amount of time and often for a specific purpose, such as nomads or soldiers

= process by which a substance or other object appears to move up by itself

= state/process by which inanimate objects shake or tremble violently
= a relatively high elevation of the earth’s surface; generally higher than a hill (גִּבְעָה)

= action in which humans or deities respond to a question or situation, either by words or by actions

Node.gloss: to go down|to come down|to climb down|to step down|to descend
Node.definition: = action by which human, animals, or deities move (voluntarily) from a place that is relatively high in elevation to a relatively lower place
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= a relatively high elevation of the earth’s surface; generally higher than a hill (גִּבְעָה)
= mountain and surrounding desert on the Sinai Peninsula in Egypt, also known as Mount Horeb (חֹורֵב) ► location where YHWH (יהוה) entered into a covenant (בְּרִית) with Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
literally: head; hence: = the topmost part of a vertically oriented object, such as a mountain, and the principal part of an horizontally oriented object, such as a street or a bed
= a relatively high elevation of the earth’s surface; generally higher than a hill (גִּבְעָה)
literally: to cry out; hence: = causative action by which humans or deities let (other) humans know that they are to come, either by approaching them directly or sending a message
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= man; ◄ son of Amram (עַמְרָם) and Jochebed (יֹוכֶבֶד) younger brother of Miriam (מִרְיָם) and Aaron (אַהֲרֹן) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► leader of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) during exodus
literally: head; hence: = the topmost part of a vertically oriented object, such as a mountain, and the principal part of an horizontally oriented object, such as a street or a bed
= a relatively high elevation of the earth’s surface; generally higher than a hill (גִּבְעָה)

Node.gloss: to go up|to climb up|to mount
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals or objects go to a place that is situated at a higher elevation, by foot, carried by hand, or with the help of a vehicle
= man; ◄ son of Amram (עַמְרָם) and Jochebed (יֹוכֶבֶד) younger brother of Miriam (מִרְיָם) and Aaron (אַהֲרֹן) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► leader of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) during exodus

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= man; ◄ son of Amram (עַמְרָם) and Jochebed (יֹוכֶבֶד) younger brother of Miriam (מִרְיָם) and Aaron (אַהֲרֹן) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► leader of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) during exodus

Node.gloss: to go down|to come down|to climb down|to step down|to descend
Node.definition: = action by which human, animals, or deities move (voluntarily) from a place that is relatively high in elevation to a relatively lower place
= action by which a person or deity informs someone with a favorable or unfavorable message about something about to happen
literally: to break through; hence: = action by which someone crosses a boundary into an area where one is not allowed to come
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something
literally: to fall; hence: = process by which humans die in a violent way
= state in which objects or events are numerous in quantity or frequency

Node.gloss: also|too|even|moreover|what is more|what is worse|furthermore|besides|both … and
Node.definition: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)
= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others

Node.gloss: to approach|to come near|to draw near|to come forward
Node.definition: = action by which humans move to a location closer to a point of reference
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= action by which humans perform the rituals that allow them to be in the presence of a deity
= action by which deities break emotionally through the barrier of patience and show their anger against someone else
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

mostly used in a negated clause; = state in which an activity cannot be carried out, as a result of a lack of skill, strength, or ability of the agent, or other circumstances that make the activity impossible

= referent to a male participant that is addressed in a discourse
= action by which a person or deity informs someone with a favorable or unfavorable message about something about to happen
